resources.string: This name will be visible to other users
Your account will be linked to this number
We will resend code again after 00:30 seconds
Add a photo so people can recognize you
"Connect, talk and share with people around you. Remember, your main avatar is you. Be yourself and look around."
Something went wrong, please try again
This number is already linked to an account. It should load soon.

"Often we don't have enough opportunity to communicate with the people around us.
Now we can do it. Here you can see the people who are nearby you and talk to them.
The app uses Bluetooth technology to search for people in your field of vision."
